item.title: #3 - Greyhound
item.description: The Question: What excites you in life? The Topic: Adopting a greyhound. The Viewermail: Ying Ying wants a visa.

item.title: #3 - Greyhound
item.description: the_intro the_question What excites you in life? Maybe nothing excites you Pushing myself excites me Opportunity excites me the_topic Talk about how I adopted a Greyhound. It’s 100% worth it. It’s a commitment. Improved my mental health Prepared me for having children the_viewermail Ying Ying from the People’s Republic of China. “Julius, I absolutely love the show. I think it’s fantastic! I’m currently looking to live in Australia, but unfortunately it’s almost impossible to get a visa.
